item.description:
CROSSLISTED WITH SOCIAL FUN, BOSTON HAPPY HOUR and BOSTON SAN FRANCISCO CREW=================

The all important GAME SEVEN is tonight -- first pitch at 8:00pm.  I'll already be there for our weekly "Geeks Who Drink" trivia night.  Trivia starts at 7:00pm if you feel like coming early to play.  Otherwise, the game will be on and once trivia is over, the manager will put on AUDIO for the game.  (Trivia usually takes about two hours.)

 

Battery Park is conveniently located in the Financial District just off of Milk Street on Batterymarch.  It is near State (Orange and Blue Lines), Aquarium (Blue Line), Gov't Center (Green and Blue Lines), and a short walk to Park Street (Green and Red Lines).  There is also metered street parking and a couple of pay garages nearby.  Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO!

Hope to see you there and GOOOOOOOO GIANTS!

 

Isabel
item.how_to_find_us: Look for my Giants hat and black World Series shirt. (Or ask Hostess)
item.name: GAME 7 NLCS Giants/Cards Viewing Party at Battery Park
